DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that subjects undergoing liver resection and who are exposed preoperatively to high illuminance blue spectrum light will exhibit reduced organ injury, specifically liver dysfunction, than subjects exposed to standard ambient white fluorescent light.
DOC.brief_title: Blue Light Therapy for Liver Surgery
DOC.criteria: age greater than 17 years undergoing right or left hepatic lobectomy presence of acute traumatic brain injury blindness immunosuppression or immunocompromised condition
